mapper.select: select sum(t.TOURISTS) as sumCount from REGION_SUMMARY_BYDAY t where t.stat_day = to_date( to_char(sysdate-1,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd')

select * from ( select nvl(sum(a.tourists),0) as tourist,a.area_name as cities,a.AREA_CODE from ( select c.AREA_NAME, t1.* from TOURIST_PHONES_BYDAY_SUM t1 join area_cfg c on t1.VISITORCITY = c.AREA_CODE where t1.ROAMINGCITY = '341500' and t1.VISITORCITY!='-111' and t1.VISITORCITY!='341500' and t1.stat_day = to_date(to_char(sysdate - 1, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') ) a group by a.area_name,a.AREA_CODE order by tourist desc ) tt where ROWNUM<=10
